item.title: You Have to Read This Classic to be Well-Read
The Best New Book Releases Out August 12, 2025
item.description: There are elderly lady serial killers, essays by trans and non-binary authors of color, and sapphic Korean vampires. AKA everything you need.

item.title: 12 New 2SLGBTQIAA+ Indigenous Books
item.description: These recent 2SLGBTQIAA+ Indigenous books include Cree short stories, Māori biopunk fantasy, Coast Salish memoir, Mi'kmaq horror, and more.

item.title: Here’s What the Biggest Book Clubs are Reading in August 2025
item.description: From Oprah to Stephen Colbert and more, here's what the biggest and most interesting book clubs are reading in August.

item.title: Major Tom’s Diner: 4 Fabulous SFF Books with Places To Eat!
item.description: It's not all blue milk! Here are four fabulous sci-fi and fantasy books with places to eat that you can check out right here on Earth.
